title: Handmade crafts e-commerce website (keychains, flowers, photo frames, bone hangings)

requirements.text: Create a public storefront with a home page and product catalog focused on handmade items (pythliner keychains, flowers, photo frames, bone hangings). The catalog must support browsing by category and viewing a product detail page with images, price, description, and availability.

quotes: Create website for selling things like pythliner keychains and flowers along with small crafts like different photo frames and bone hangings for selling

acceptanceCriteria: Home page loads and clearly introduces the shop and featured categories/items.
Catalog page lists products with thumbnail, name, price, and category.
Users can filter or navigate by category (keychains, flowers, photo frames, bone hangings).
Product detail page shows at least: name, images, description, price, and an in-stock indicator.

requirements.text: Implement shopping cart functionality: add-to-cart from catalog/detail, update quantities, remove items, and show cart subtotal. Cart state must persist during navigation and reload (e.g., local storage).

quotes: Create website for selling things like pythliner keychains and flowers along with small crafts like different photo frames and bone hangings for selling

acceptanceCriteria: Users can add a product to cart from the product detail page.
Cart page/drawer displays line items with quantity controls and remove actions.
Subtotal updates correctly when quantities change.
Cart contents persist after page refresh.

requirements.text: Create a checkout flow that collects buyer details (name, phone/email, shipping address, optional order notes) and places an order into the backend. Show an order confirmation screen with an order ID.

quotes: Create website for selling things like pythliner keychains and flowers along with small crafts like different photo frames and bone hangings for selling

acceptanceCriteria: Checkout form validates required fields before submission.
Submitting checkout creates an order record in the backend and returns an order ID.
Confirmation page displays the order ID and a summary of purchased items.

requirements.text: Backend: implement Motoko data models and APIs to manage products and orders within the single main actor. Include functions to list products, get a product by ID, create an order, and fetch order details by ID.

quotes: Create website for selling things like pythliner keychains and flowers along with small crafts like different photo frames and bone hangings for selling

acceptanceCriteria: Backend exposes query method(s) to list products and get product details by ID.
Backend exposes an update method to create an order and returns a unique order ID.
Backend stores orders and can return order details for a given order ID.
At least a small seed set of products exists (covering the four categories) to demonstrate the UI.

requirements.text: Add a simple navigation structure (header with shop name, links to Home/Catalog/Cart) and a footer with basic shop info. All user-facing text must be in English.

quotes: Create website for selling things like pythliner keychains and flowers along with small crafts like different photo frames and bone hangings for selling

acceptanceCriteria: Header includes a cart link/icon with item count badge.
Footer is present on main pages and contains shop info text in English.
Navigation works across Home, Catalog, Product Detail, Cart, and Checkout.

requirements.text: Establish a coherent, creative visual theme suitable for a handmade crafts shop (color palette, typography, spacing, components) and apply it consistently across all pages (avoid a generic default look).
acceptanceCriteria: Theme is consistent across pages (buttons, cards, headings, form inputs).
Visual style clearly reads as “handmade crafts” (e.g., warm neutrals, paper/texture-inspired surfaces, tasteful accents) and does not use a blue/purple-dominant palette.
UI remains accessible with readable contrast and clear hierarchy.

requirements.text: Add required generated images to the project as static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated and render them in the UI (do not serve generated images through the backend).
acceptanceCriteria: Generated images exist at frontend/public/assets/generated with the specified filenames.
Home page uses the hero banner image.
Site uses the logo image in the header and/or favicon area (as appropriate).

constraints: Backend must remain a single Motoko actor with all logic in the main backend file.
Do not edit any frontend files under the immutable paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT; compose/wrap components instead.
Use English for all user-facing UI text.
nonGoals: Payment processing integration (e.g., Stripe) is out of scope for this build.
Real-time inventory syncing, shipping rate calculators, and third-party logistics integrations are out of scope.
Third-party authentication providers (non-Internet Identity) are out of scope.

required: Handmade crafts shop logo, simple line-art emblem (crafts-logo.dim_512x512.png)
Warm handmade crafts hero banner with subtle paper texture and small illustrated motifs (crafts-hero.dim_1600x600.png)
Set of four minimal category icons in a cohesive style: keychain, flower, photo frame, hanging ornament (category-icons-sprite.dim_1024x256.png)

goalsToAdd: Build a handmade crafts e-commerce storefront to sell pythliner keychains, flowers, photo frames, and bone hangings.
